description:
Photo Manipulation is one of the most unique and creative techniques a graphic designer can turn a photograph into anything he/she wants.

In this course, we'll walk through the process of Photo manipulation by:

  • Taking in a concept
  • Breaking down the concept and working on it
  • Taking stock images and mixing them
  • Creating realistic shadows
  • Creating realistic animal skin.

Please keep in mind that a basic knowledge of Adobe Photoshop is needed for the course.
title: Guide to Photo Manipulation
